localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: We rendered a million web pages to find out what makes the web slow
blogPost.author: simonpure

localize.title: 我们渲染了一百万个网页，找出是什么让网络变慢的原因
我們渲染了一百萬個網頁，找出是什麼讓網絡變慢的原因

previous.excerpt:
Sorry for trying to get around the automod but this is important, a fellow
subreddit is being attacked.

Please see this archived post from zjz, the mod who had been holding down the
fort and one of the many good mods who was kicked off W-S-B and replaced with
brand new accounts:…
previous.title: W-S-B is going through a hostile take over from old inactive mods seeking to profit off of the subreddit

localize.title: W-S-B正在经历一个敌对的接管，从老的不活跃的mods寻求利润的subreddit。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
对不起，我想绕过自动驾驶，但这很重要，一个同胞。
子reddit被攻击了。

请看这篇来自zjz的存档帖子，这个版主一直在维护着这个
堡垒和许多优秀的mods之一，谁被踢出W-S-B和取代与。
全新的账户：...

localize.title: W-S-B正在經歷一個敵對的接管，從老的不活躍的mods尋求利潤的subreddit。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
對不起，我想繞過自動駕駛，但這很重要，一個同胞。
子reddit被攻擊了。

請看這篇來自zjz的存檔帖子，這個版主一直在維護着這個
堡壘和許多優秀的mods之一，誰被踢出W-S-B和取代與。
全新的賬戶：...
